name: Light Healing
effect: Heals the caster for a small amount of health.

name: Intense Healing
effect: Heals the caster for a moderate amount of health.

name: Ultimate Healing
effect: Heals the caster for a large amount of health.

name: Light
effect: Creates a magical light that illuminates dark areas.

name: Magic Shield
effect: Converts damage to mana instead of health.

name: Fireball
effect: Shoots a ball of fire at the target, dealing fire damage.

name: Great Fireball
effect: Shoots a large fireball that explodes, damaging multiple targets.

name: Energy Beam
effect: Shoots a beam of energy in a straight line.

name: Sudden Death
effect: Deals massive death damage to a single target.

name: Poison Field
effect: Creates a field of poison on the ground.

name: Cure Poison
effect: Removes poison status from the caster.

name: Haste
effect: Increases movement speed for a short duration.

name: Invisibility
effect: Makes the caster invisible to monsters and players.

name: Divine Missile
effect: Shoots a holy missile at the target.

name: Summon Creature
effect: Summons a creature to fight alongside you. Specific creatures require different incantations.
